changeSet.sql:
UPDATE METADATADEFINITION SET MANDATORY = FALSE, MANDATORYSTATES = NULL WHERE DOCUMENTTYPE_ID = (SELECT ID FROM DOCUMENTTYPE WHERE NAME = 'Misiune de audit si control') AND NAME = 'recomandari_audit';
